Name: Cinnamon Bread
Details:
2 tsp ground cinnamon and 1/3 cup brown sugar for topping
2 cups of vegan flour
1/2 tsp salt
1 tbsp baking powder
1 brown sugar
1 mashed banana
1 cup oat milk
1/3 cup of coconut oil


Preheat oven to 350°f and grease a loaf pan.
In a bowl combine oat milk, mashed banana and melted coconut oil. Also add the baking powder, flour, brown sugar and salt into the bowl. Be sure to mix everything evenly.
In a bowl mix brown sugar and cinnamon spice for topping.
Pour batter into loaf pan and top with cinnamon/brown sugar topping.
Place loaf into oven for 40-50 minutes until toothpicks inserted into loaf come out clean without batter.
Take out and let loaf cool before cutting
Reheat and top with vegan butter.
Enjoy!

Name: Portobello Mushroom Fajitas
Details:
Flour Tortillas of your choice
Guacamole (optional)
1/4 Taco seasoning
Cilantro for garnish (optional)
3 Tri-color Bell peppers sliced into 1/2 inch slices
1 Lime juiced
1lbs Portobello mushrooms sliced into 1/2 inch slices
1 Red onion, Sliced
2 tbsp olive oil

Preheat oven to 450°F and oil a baking pan.
In a bowl combine taco seasoning, olive oil and lime juice and toss the sliced portabella mushrooms in the marinade.
Spread bowl contents onto oiled baking pan and bake for 20 minutes.
Serve with warmed tortillas and guacamole.
Enjoy!
